data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Ashokan, Ajith, Gowda, Vinita (2019): Hedychiumziroense (Zingiberaceae), a new species of ginger lily from Northeast India. PhytoKeys 117: 73-84, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/phytokeys.117.24951, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/phytokeys.117.24951
